alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fremont, southeastern Teller and southwestern El Paso Counties through 100 PM MDT... At 1229 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Victor, or 12 miles southwest of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Fort Carson and Security-Widefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
